import React from'react';import'./index.css';import{Button,Navbar,Nav,NavDropdown,Form,FormControl,Brand,Toggle,NavItem}from'react-bootstrap';import{Switch,Route,BrowserRouter as Router}from"react-router-dom";import star from'../images/star.png';import db from'../firebaseConfig';function Video(props){var id_on_youtube=props.videoDetails.id_on_youtube;function deleteVideo(){var videoRef=db.collection('YouTube');var query=videoRef.where('id_on_youtube','==',id_on_youtube).get().then(function(snapshot){snapshot.forEach(function(doc){console.log(doc.id,'=>',doc.data());var deleteDoc=db.collection('YouTube').doc(doc.id).delete();});}).catch(function(err){console.log('Error getting documents',err);});}var iframeSRC="https://www.youtube.com/embed/".concat(props.videoDetails.id_on_youtube);var videoContainer={border:'1px solid black',textAlign:'center',margin:'20px 10px',width:'25%',height:'auto',paddingBottom:'8px'// position: 'relative',
};var elementStyle={marginBottom:'-4px'};return/*#__PURE__*/React.createElement("div",{style:videoContainer},/*#__PURE__*/React.createElement("iframe",{width:"100%",height:"auto",src:iframeSRC,frameborder:"0",allow:"accelerometer; autoplay; encrypted-media; gyroscope; picture-in-picture",allowfullscreen:true}),/*#__PURE__*/React.createElement("p",{style:elementStyle},props.videoDetails.title),/*#__PURE__*/React.createElement("p",{style:elementStyle},props.videoDetails.date),/*#__PURE__*/React.createElement("p",{style:elementStyle},starMaker(props.videoDetails.rating)),/*#__PURE__*/React.createElement(Button,{onClick:deleteVideo,style:elementStyle,variant:"danger"},"Delete"),/*#__PURE__*/React.createElement(Button,{style:elementStyle,variant:"secondary"},"Archive"));}export default Video;function starMaker(rating){for(var i=0;i<rating;i++){return/*#__PURE__*/React.createElement("img",{id:"rating-star",alt:"star-icon",src:star});}}
